message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $90. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $80.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $85. What do you think?
